name: Thermal refugia
functionStatement: Shade, solar input, and groundwater keep temperature and light within natural ranges for stream metabolism and dissolved oxygen.
descriptionMarkdown: Springs or deeper pools temper extremes, unless large daily swings are historically normal (arid ephemeral).
howToMeasureMarkdown: Locate cooler pockets or deeper pools using a field temperature check or loggers where available.

levels.label: Strongly Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: No detectable cool pockets in a reach that historically had springs or deep pools.
Criteria: No refuges where historically expected. High thermal risk.

levels.label: Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Scattered weak cool spots with little depth refuge.
Criteria: Rare or minimal cooler zones. Partial stress.

levels.label: Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: One small spring-fed side channel with limited extent.
Criteria: One to two minor or limited refuges.

levels.label: Strongly Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Multiple cold seeps and deep pools evident. Fish aggregations present on hot days.
Criteria: Multiple cooler pockets or deeper pools moderating temperature extremes.

references: mapped springs/seeps and baseflow indices (where available).
